title: Boutique stay in the heart of Mallorca
description: Live the island life in style, staying at the Hotel Es Princep, Palma, Mallorca's most charming hotel, located in the heart of this lively coastal city. Stay in a Superior room overlooking the Mediterranean sea and enjoy daily breakfast, a welcome drink and access to the hotel luxurious Spa, Coco.
offer_address: Carrer Bala Roja, 1, 07001 Palma, Illes Balears, Spain
